items.a: FairArena es una plataforma de gestión de hackathons impulsada por IA que ayuda a los organizadores a realizar eventos sin problemas con puntuación automatizada, tablas de clasificación en vivo, paneles de jueces, análisis de sitios web de IA y seguimiento completo de eventos.
Organizadores (pago), jueces (gratis) y participantes (gratis).
Verifica el rendimiento, UI/UX, velocidad, SEO, accesibilidad, singularidad, errores y genera sugerencias de mejora.

items.q: ¿Pueden varios jueces puntuar el mismo proyecto?
items.a: Sí. Las puntuaciones de todos los jueces se combinan automáticamente.
Sí: rondas preliminares, semifinales y finales.
Los jueces y participantes siempre usan FairArena de forma gratuita durante los hackathons. Los organizadores eligen un plan pago.
Sí: informes de puntuación detallados, análisis y hojas de ganadores.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Encuentre respuestas a preguntas frecuentes sobre FairArena
faq.noResults: No se encontraron preguntas que coincidan con su búsqueda.

contact.title: ¿Todavía tienes preguntas?
contact.subtitle: ¿No encuentras la respuesta que buscas? Nuestro equipo de soporte está aquí para ayudar.

items.a: FairArena is an AI-powered hackathon management platform that helps organizers run fair, transparent, and efficient hackathons. We provide real-time leaderboards, automated judging workflows, AI project analysis, and comprehensive analytics.

FairArena is designed for hackathon organizers, judges, and participants. Organizers use our platform to manage events, judges use it to score projects efficiently, and participants can track their rankings in real-time.

We offer different pricing tiers. Judges and participants always use the platform for free. Organizers can choose from our Free, Pro, or Enterprise plans based on their event size and needs. Check our pricing page for details.

items.q: How do I create an account?
items.a: Click the "Sign Up" button in the top right corner. You can sign up using your email or use OAuth providers like GitHub, Google, Atlassian, Figma, Vercel, or Zoom for quick registration.

items.q: How do I organize my first hackathon?
items.a: After signing up, go to your dashboard and click "Create Hackathon". Fill in the event details, add judges, configure scoring criteria, and invite participants. Our step-by-step wizard will guide you through the process.

items.q: Can I import participants from a CSV file?
items.a: Yes! In your hackathon dashboard, navigate to the Participants section and use the "Import CSV" feature. Make sure your CSV includes required fields like name, email, and team information.

Our AI analyzes submitted projects for performance, SEO, UI/UX, accessibility, code quality, and uniqueness. It provides detailed reports and suggestions, helping judges make informed decisions and giving participants valuable feedback.

As judges submit scores, our system automatically calculates rankings and updates the leaderboard in real-time using WebSocket technology. Participants can see their standings instantly, creating an engaging and transparent experience.

Absolutely! You can create custom scoring rubrics with weighted criteria tailored to your hackathon. Define categories like innovation, technical complexity, design, and impact with custom weightings.

Yes! You can configure multiple judging rounds (e.g., preliminary, semi-finals, finals) with different judge panels and criteria for each round. The system automatically advances teams based on your configuration.
We take security seriously. All data is encrypted in transit (TLS) and at rest. We implement CSRF protection, rate limiting, and follow OWASP security best practices. We are SOC 2 Type II compliant.
Yes! Enterprise plans include Single Sign-On (SSO) with SAML 2.0 support. You can configure domain verification and enforce SSO for your organization members.
Data is stored in secure cloud infrastructure with automatic backups. We use industry-standard databases with encryption and follow GDPR, CCPA, and other data protection regulations.

items.q: What payment methods do you accept?
items.a: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover) and support international payments. Enterprise customers can also pay via invoice.

items.q: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
items.a: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period. No cancellation fees apply.
We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. If you're not satisfied, contact our support team within 14 days of purchase for a full refund. See our refund policy for details.
FairArena works best on modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge (latest 2 versions). We also support mobile browsers for on-the-go access.
Yes! We provide a comprehensive REST API and OAuth 2.0 support for integrations. Enterprise plans include higher rate limits and dedicated API support. Check our API documentation for details.

items.q: Do you have a mobile app?
items.a: Currently, we offer a fully responsive web application that works great on mobile devices. Native iOS and Android apps are on our roadmap for 2026.

You can reach our support team via email at fairarena.contact@gmail.com, through the support page, or by using the in-app chat. Enterprise customers get priority support with dedicated account managers.

items.q: Do you offer training or onboarding?
items.a: Yes! We provide comprehensive documentation, video tutorials, and live onboarding sessions for Pro and Enterprise customers. We also offer custom training for large organizations.

items.q: What is your average response time?
items.a: Free tier: 48 hours, Pro: 24 hours, Enterprise: 4 hours (priority support). Critical issues are escalated immediately for all paid plans.

refund.title: Política de Reembolso
refund.subtitle: FairArena generalmente no ofrece reembolsos por servicios digitales. Lea esta política detenidamente antes de realizar cualquier compra.
refund.policyText: FairArena se reserva el derecho de denegar solicitudes de reembolso a su entera discreción. Los reembolsos no están garantizados y pueden rechazarse por cualquier motivo.
refund.disclaimer: Al comprar créditos o servicios de FairArena, usted reconoce y acepta expresamente que todas las ventas son finales.

list: Suspensión o terminación de la cuenta
Violación de los Términos de Servicio
Cambio de opinión o remordimiento del comprador
Dificultades técnicas o problemas de servicio
Créditos ya consumidos o utilizados
Pagos duplicados o accidentales
Complicaciones de servicios de terceros
Períodos de tiempo extendidos desde la compra
Indisponibilidad completa y prolongada de la plataforma que supere los treinta (30) días consecutivos
Compromiso de seguridad crítico que afecte directamente a los sistemas de procesamiento de pagos

contact.title: Solicitud de Reembolso
contact.desc: Las solicitudes de reembolso pueden enviarse a través del canal de comunicación designado. FairArena se reserva el derecho de determinar los protocolos de respuesta.

refund.date: Vigente a partir de diciembre de 2025
refund.footer: Todas las determinaciones de reembolso se toman a entera discreción de FairArena y son finales.

intro.title: Empoderando Hackathons con Transparencia, Velocidad e IA
intro.part1: FairArena fue creado con una misión simple:
intro.highlight: hacer que los hackathons sean justos, basados en datos y sin esfuerzo para todos.
intro.part2: No más hojas de Excel. No más jueces confundidos. No más participantes esperando horas por los resultados.
intro.part3: Construimos una plataforma donde los organizadores, jueces y participantes experimentan los hackathons como deben ser:

mission.title: Nuestra Misión
mission.desc1: Llevar justicia, precisión y automatización a cada hackathon en el mundo.
mission.desc2: Creemos que cada equipo merece una puntuación imparcial, cada juez merece un flujo de trabajo simple y cada organizador merece un panel sin estrés.

vision.title: Nuestra Visión
vision.desc1: Convertirnos en la plataforma de hackathon más confiable del mundo, combinando IA, transparencia y tecnología para crear eventos de innovación inolvidables.
list: Cada hackathon sea asistido por IA
Los participantes vean las clasificaciones en tiempo real
Los organizadores realicen eventos sin esfuerzo
Los jueces obtengan mejores conocimientos
Cada decisión esté respaldada por datos

list.title: Sistema operativo de hackathon todo en uno
list.desc: Gestione, puntúe, analice y finalice ganadores, todo en un solo panel.

list.title: Análisis de proyectos impulsado por IA
list.desc: Rendimiento, SEO, UI/UX, accesibilidad, errores, singularidad: analizados al instante.

list.title: Tablas de clasificación en tiempo real transparentes
list.desc: Los participantes siempre saben dónde se encuentran.

list.title: Flujo de trabajo con cero errores manuales
list.desc: Sin puntuaciones no coincidentes. Sin caos en las hojas de cálculo.

list.title: Construido para organizadores: gratis para jueces y participantes

whoUses.title: ¿Quién usa FairArena?
whoUses.desc1: FairArena cuenta con la confianza de:
list: Colegios y universidades
Comunidades tecnológicas
Startups y empresas
Organizadores de hackathons
Grupos de desarrolladores
Eventos de innovación
whoUses.desc2: Ya sean 50 estudiantes o 5000 desarrolladores, FairArena escala al instante.

tech.title: Nuestra Tecnología
list1: Cálculos automatizados de tablas de clasificación
Análisis de sitios web con IA
Paneles de jueces de varias rondas
Infraestructura en la nube de alta velocidad
tech.desc2: Nuestros modelos de IA analizan proyectos para:

passion.title: Construido con pasión por la innovación
passion.desc1: FairArena existe porque amamos los hackathons. Hemos participado en ellos, los hemos organizado y los hemos juzgado. Sabemos qué hace que un evento sea excelente y qué lo arruina.

promise.label: Nuestra promesa:
promise.text: Decisiones justas. Puntuación clara. Sin confusión. Innovación pura.

cta.title: Únase a nosotros para reimaginar los hackathons
cta.desc: FairArena es más que una herramienta: es un movimiento para hacer que la innovación sea accesible, transparente y emocionante.
cta.item1: Organice su próximo hackathon con FairArena

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.subtitle: Track every improvement, feature, and fix we ship to make FairArena better for you.

stayUpdated.title: Stay Updated
stayUpdated.text: Follow our journey as we continue to build the best hackathon platform in the world.

changes.description: Added Enterprise SSO with domain verification and SAML 2.0 support for organizations
Implemented OAuth 2.0 Device Authorization Flow for CLI and IoT devices
Added support for multiple OAuth providers: GitHub, Google, Atlassian, Figma, Vercel, and Zoom
Enhanced CSRF protection with dedicated token endpoint and automatic refresh
Migrated to TanStack DB for sub-millisecond reactive updates in Inbox
Fixed authentication token refresh causing unexpected logouts
Implemented OAuth 2.0 Device Authorization Flow for headless devices
Added Atlassian OAuth integration with environment configuration
Updated frontend sign-in/sign-up pages to display all OAuth providers
Fixed "Unknown Application" error on device consent page
Resolved authentication issues with /device/verify endpoint
Applied database migrations with Prisma for schema updates
Added team invitation system with email notifications
Enhanced backend server restart handling after configuration changes
Fixed authentication flow with proper token refresh and session invalidation
Refactored MCP server to use HTTP/SSE transport instead of stdio
Added production-ready Dockerfile for containerized deployment
Implemented rate limiting, CORS, and authentication for MCP server
Secured Pinecone credentials server-side with client-provided Gemini API keys
Created comprehensive README.md and mcp-config.example.json
Fixed TypeScript errors in production feature implementation
Integrated Pinecone vector database for AI-powered documentation search
Added search_documentation tool with embedding-based retrieval
Moved AI system prompt to separate file for better maintainability
Fixed Pinecone dimension mismatch by using 384-dimensional embeddings
Resolved sharp module installation error for @xenova/transformers
Launched OAuth authorization endpoint with consent flow
Added OAuth application management dashboard
Fixed 404 error for /oauth/authorize endpoint
Added SECURITY notification type for security-related alerts
Redesigned feedback and unsubscribe pages with minimal blackish theme using Shadcn UI
Fixed upstream image response timeout errors during development
Resolved Docker build failures with pnpm installation
Added real-time GitHub repository stats display in sidebar and footer
Implemented Redis caching with 6-hour TTL for GitHub data
Added TanStack Query with 2-hour staleTime for optimized data fetching
Enhanced authentication state caching after login and MFA verification
Fixed infinite loop in Axios interceptor when token refresh fails

accessibility.title: Accessibility Statement
accessibility.subtitle: FairArena is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continually improving the user experience for everyone.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.text1: FairArena is committed to making our platform accessible to all users, including those with disabilities. We strive to conform to the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA standards.
commitment.text2: We believe that everyone should have equal access to our hackathon management platform, regardless of their abilities or the technologies they use.

keyboard.title: Keyboard Navigation
keyboard.desc: Full keyboard support for all interactive elements. Navigate using Tab, Enter, and arrow keys.

screenReader.title: Screen Reader Compatible
screenReader.desc: ARIA labels and semantic HTML ensure compatibility with screen readers like NVDA, JAWS, and VoiceOver.

highContrast.title: High Contrast Mode
highContrast.desc: Support for high contrast themes and color schemes for users with visual impairments.

resizableText.title: Resizable Text
resizableText.desc: All text can be resized up to 200% without loss of functionality or content.

focusIndicators.title: Focus Indicators
focusIndicators.desc: Clear visual focus indicators for all interactive elements.

captions.title: Captions & Transcripts
captions.desc: Video and audio content includes captions and transcripts where applicable.

standards.title: Standards & Guidelines
list: WCAG 2.1 Level AA compliance
Section 508 of the Rehabilitation Act
EN 301 549 European accessibility standard
Semantic HTML5 markup
ARIA (Accessible Rich Internet Applications) attributes

feedback.title: Feedback & Contact
feedback.text: We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of FairArena. If you encounter any accessibility barriers, please let us know:
feedback.response: We aim to respond to accessibility feedback within 2 business days and to propose a solution within 10 business days.

communityGuidelines.title: Community Guidelines
communityGuidelines.subtitle: Building a safe, respectful, and collaborative community for hackathon enthusiasts worldwide

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.text1: FairArena is committed to providing a welcoming and inclusive environment for everyone. These guidelines help ensure that our community remains a positive space for learning, collaboration, and innovation.
commitment.text2: By using FairArena, you agree to follow these guidelines and help us maintain a respectful community.

respectful.title: Be Respectful
respectful.desc: Treat all community members with respect and kindness. Harassment, hate speech, and discrimination will not be tolerated.

collaborate.title: Collaborate & Share
collaborate.desc: FairArena is built on collaboration. Share knowledge, help others, and contribute to the community.

integrity.title: Maintain Integrity
integrity.desc: Be honest and transparent. Do not cheat, plagiarize, or engage in any form of academic dishonesty.

communicate.title: Communicate Clearly
communicate.desc: Use clear, professional language. Avoid spam, off-topic content, and excessive self-promotion.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Content & Behavior
prohibited.text: The following behaviors and content are strictly prohibited on FairArena:

enforcement.title: Enforcement
enforcement.text: Violations of these guidelines may result in:
items: Legal action in cases of severe violations
enforcement.note: We review each case individually and take appropriate action based on the severity and context of the violation.

report.title: Report Violations
report.text: If you witness or experience a violation of these guidelines, please report it immediately. All reports are reviewed promptly and handled with confidentiality.

securityPolicy.title: Security Policy
securityPolicy.subtitle: Your security and privacy are our top priorities. Learn how we protect your data.

encryption.title: Data Encryption
encryption.desc: All data is encrypted in transit using TLS 1.3 and at rest using AES-256 encryption.

auth.title: Secure Authentication
auth.desc: Multi-factor authentication, OAuth 2.0, and WebAuthn support for secure access.

protection.title: Data Protection
protection.desc: Regular backups, disaster recovery plans, and GDPR compliance for data protection.

monitoring.title: Security Monitoring
monitoring.desc: 24/7 security monitoring, intrusion detection, and automated threat response.

access.title: Access Control
access.desc: Role-based access control (RBAC) and principle of least privilege enforcement.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.desc: Privacy by design, minimal data collection, and transparent data practices.

disclosure.title: Responsible Disclosure
disclosure.text: We appreciate the security research community's efforts to help keep FairArena secure. If you discover a security vulnerability, please report it responsibly:

pgp.label: PGP Key
pgp.value: Available upon request for encrypted communications

response.label: Response Time
response.value: We aim to respond within 24 hours and provide updates every 72 hours

bounty.title: Security Acknowledgments
bounty.text: We recognize and thank security researchers who help us improve FairArena's security. Researchers who responsibly disclose vulnerabilities may be eligible for:
list: Public acknowledgment in our security hall of fame
Monetary rewards for critical vulnerabilities
FairArena swag and premium account benefits

standards.title: Standards
list: GDPR Compliant
SOC 2 Type II (in progress)
ISO 27001 (in progress)
OWASP Top 10 Protection

audits.title: Security Audits
list: Annual penetration testing
Quarterly security assessments
Continuous vulnerability scanning
Third-party security audits

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: FairArena ("us", "we", or "our") operates the FairArena website (the "Service"). This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data when you use our Service and the choices you have associated with that data. We use your data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.description: We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Service to you.

personalData.title: 1.1 Personal Data
personalData.description: While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you ("Personal Data"). Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:
list: Email address
First name and last name
Phone number
Address, State, Province, ZIP/Postal code, City
Cookies and Usage Data
Social Media Profile information (if you log in via 3rd party services like Google or GitHub)

usageData.title: 1.2 Usage Data
usageData.description: We may also collect information how the Service is accessed and used ("Usage Data"). This Usage Data may include information such as:
list: Your computer's Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address)
Browser type and browser version
The pages of our Service that you visit
The time and date of your visit
The time spent on those pages
Unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data

tracking.title: 1.3 Tracking & Cookies Data
tracking.description: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our Service and hold certain information.
list: Session Cookies: We use Session Cookies to operate our Service.
Preference Cookies: We use Preference Cookies to remember your preferences and various settings.
Security Cookies: We use Security Cookies for security purposes.

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Data
usage.intro: FairArena uses the collected data for various purposes:
list: To provide and maintain the Service
To notify you about changes to our Service
To allow you to participate in interactive features of our Service when you choose to do so
To provide customer care and support
To provide analysis or valuable information so that we can improve the Service
To monitor the usage of the Service
To detect, prevent and address technical issues
To process payments and manage billing (via secure third-party processors)

retention.title: 3. Retention of Data
retention.content1: FairArena will retain your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies.
retention.content2: FairArena will also retain Usage Data for internal analysis purposes. Usage Data is generally retained for a shorter period of time, except when this data is used to strengthen the security or to improve the functionality of our Service, or we are legally obligated to retain this data for longer time periods.

transfer.title: 4. Transfer of Data
transfer.content1: Your information, including Personal Data, may be transferred to — and maintained on — computers located outside of your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ than those from your jurisdiction.
transfer.content2: If you are located outside India and choose to provide information to us, please note that we transfer the data, including Personal Data, to India and process it there.
transfer.content3: Your consent to this Privacy Policy followed by your submission of such information represents your agreement to that transfer.

disclosure.title: 5. Disclosure of Data
disclosure.subtitle: 5.1 Legal Requirements
disclosure.description: FairArena may disclose your Personal Data in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to:
list: To comply with a legal obligation
To protect and defend the rights or property of FairArena
To prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the Service
To protect the personal safety of users of the Service or the public
To protect against legal liability

security.title: 6. Security of Data
security.content: The security of your data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

providers.title: 7. Service Providers
providers.content1: We may employ third party companies and individuals to facilitate our Service ("Service Providers"), to provide the Service on our behalf, to perform Service-related services or to assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.
providers.content2: These third parties have access to your Personal Data only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.

links.title: 8. Links to Other Sites
links.content1: Our Service may contain links to other sites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit.
links.content2: We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services.

children.title: 9. Children's Privacy
children.content1: Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 13 ("Children").
children.content2: We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 13. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your Children has provided us with Personal Data, please contact us. If we become aware that we have collected Personal Data from children without verification of parental consent, we take steps to remove that information from our servers.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content1: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
changes.content2: We will let you know via email and/or a prominent notice on our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the "effective date" at the top of this Privacy Policy.
changes.content3: You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.intro: Please read these Terms and Conditions ("Terms", "Terms and Conditions") carefully before using the FairArena website and service (the "Service") operated by FairArena ("us", "we", or "our"). Your access to and use of the Service is conditioned on your acceptance of and compliance with these Terms. These Terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access or use the Service. By accessing or using the Service you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, then you may not access the Service.

definitions.title: 1. Interpretation and Definitions
definitions.content: The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.
list: “Company”, “We”, “Us”, or “Our” refers to FairArena, the provider of the Service.
“Service” refers to the FairArena hackathon management platform, website, and related services managed by the Company.

“User”, “You”, or “Your” refers to the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable.
“Account” means a unique account created for You to access our Service or parts of our Service.
“Organiser” refers to a User who creates and manages hackathons via the Service.
“Participant” refers to a User who registers for and submits projects to hackathons.
“Judge” refers to a User invited to evaluate submissions.
“Content” refers to content such as text, images, or other information that can be posted, uploaded, linked to or otherwise made available by You, regardless of the form of that content.

accounts.title: 2. Accounts and Registration
accounts.content: When You create an account with Us, You must provide us information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times.
list: You must provide accurate, complete, and current information at all times. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the Terms.
You are responsible for safeguarding the password that You use to access the Service and for any activities or actions under Your password.
You agree not to disclose Your password to any third party. You must notify Us immediately upon becoming aware of any breach of security or unauthorized use of Your Account.
We reserve the right to refuse service, terminate accounts, remove or edit content, or cancel orders in our sole discretion.

usage.title: 3. Use of Service and Restrictions
list: You agree not to use the Service for any unlawful purpose or in any way that interrupts, damages, impairs, or renders the Service less efficient.
You must not attempt to gain unauthorized access to our Service, the server on which our Service is stored or any server, computer or database connected to our Service.
You must not use the Service to transmit any unsolicited or unauthorized advertising, promotional materials, or spam.
Organisers are solely responsible for the administration of their hackathons, including the verification of Participants and Judges.

intellectualProperty.title: 4. Intellectual Property Rights
list: The Service and its original content (excluding Content provided by You or other Users), features and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of the Company and its licensors.
The Service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws of both the Country and foreign countries.
Our trademarks and trade dress may not be used in connection with any product or service without the prior written consent of the Company.

By submitting Content (including project submissions), You grant Us a right to use, modify, perform, display, reproduce, and distribute such Content on and through the Service for the purpose of operating and improving the Service.

aiDisclaimer.title: 5. AI Analysis and Disclaimers
list: FairArena utilizes Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies to provide insights, analysis, and scoring assistance.
AI-generated results are advisory in nature and may not be 100% accurate or free from bias.
Organisers and Judges retain full discretion and responsibility for final decision-making and scoring.
We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or usefulness of any AI-generated analysis.

links.title: 6. Links to Other Websites
links.content: Our Service may contain links to third-party web sites or services that are not owned or controlled by the Company. The Company has no control over, and assumes no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party web sites or services. You further acknowledge and agree that the Company shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with the use of or reliance on any such content, goods or services available on or through any such web sites or services.

termination.title: 7. Termination
list: We may terminate or suspend Your Account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if You breach these Terms.
Upon termination, Your right to use the Service will cease immediately.
If You wish to terminate Your Account, You may simply discontinue using the Service or delete your account through the settings.

liability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
list: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, in no event shall the Company be liable for any special, incidental, indirect, or consequential damages whatsoever (including, but not limited to, damages for loss of profits, loss of data or other information, for business interruption, for personal injury, loss of privacy arising out of or in any way related to the use of or inability to use the Service).

Our total liability to You for any claims arising out of or relating to these Terms or Your use of the Service is limited to the amount You paid us to use the Service in the 12 months prior to the act that gave rise to the liability.

disclaimer.title: 9. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content1: The Service is provided to You "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" and with all faults and defects without warranty of any kind. To the maximum extent permitted under applicable law, the Company expressly disclaims all warranties, whether express, implied, statutory or otherwise, with respect to the Service, including all implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, title and non-infringement.
disclaimer.content2: Without limiting the foregoing, neither the Company nor any of the company's provider makes any representation or warranty of any kind, express or implied: (i) as to the operation or availability of the Service, or the information, content, and materials or products included thereon; (ii) that the Service will be uninterrupted or error-free; (iii) as to the accuracy, reliability, or currency of any information or content provided through the Service.

governing.title: 10. Governing Law
governing.content: The laws of India, excluding its conflicts of law rules, shall govern this Terms and Your use of the Service. Your use of the Application may also be subject to other local, state, national, or international laws.

disputes.title: 11. Disputes Resolution
disputes.content: If You have any concern or dispute about the Service, You agree to first try to resolve the dispute informally by contacting the Company.

changes.title: 12. Changes to These Terms
changes.content1: We reserve the right, at Our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material We will make reasonable efforts to provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at Our sole discretion.
changes.content2: By continuing to access or use Our Service after those revisions become effective, You agree to be bound by the revised terms. If You do not agree to the new terms, in whole or in part, please stop using the website and the Service.

contact.title: 13. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms, You can contact us:

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.intro: This Cookie Policy explains what Cookies are and how We use them. You should read this policy so You can understand what type of cookies We use, or the information We collect using Cookies and how that information is used. This Cookie Policy has been created with the help of the Cookies Policy Generator.
cookiePolicy.intro2: Cookies do not typically contain any information that personally identifies a user, but personal information that we store about You may be linked to the information stored in and obtained from Cookies. For further information on how We use, store and keep your personal data secure, see our Privacy Policy.

definitions.title: 1. Interpretation and Definitions
definitions.content1: The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.
list: “Company” (referred to as either "the Company", "We", "Us" or "Our" in this Cookies Policy) refers to FairArena.
“Cookies” means small files that are placed on Your computer, mobile device or any other device by a website, containing details of Your browsing history on that website among its many uses.
“Website” refers to FairArena, accessible from fair.sakshamg.me
“You” means the individual accessing or using the Website, or a company, or any legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Website, as applicable.

usage.title: 2. The Use of the Cookies
usage.subtitle: 2.1 Type of Cookies We Use
usage.content1: Cookies can be "Persistent" or "Session" Cookies. Persistent Cookies remain on your personal computer or mobile device when You go offline, while Session Cookies are deleted as soon as You close your web browser.
usage.content2: We use both session and persistent Cookies for the purposes set out below:

essential.title: Necessary / Essential Cookies
essential.purpose: Purpose: These Cookies are essential to provide You with services available through the Website and to enable You to use some of its features. They help to authenticate users and prevent fraudulent use of user accounts. Without these Cookies, the services that You have asked for cannot be provided, and We only use these Cookies to provide You with those services.

functionality.title: Functionality Cookies
functionality.purpose: Purpose: These Cookies allow us to remember choices You make when You use the Website, such as remembering your login details or language preference. The purpose of these Cookies is to provide You with a more personal experience and to avoid You having to re-enter your preferences every time You use the Website.

tracking.title: Tracking and Performance Cookies
tracking.purpose: Purpose: These Cookies are used to track information about traffic to the Website and how users use the Website. The information gathered via these Cookies may directly or indirectly identify you as an individual visitor. This is because the information collected is typically linked to a pseudonymous identifier associated with the device you use to access the Website. We may also use these Cookies to test new advertisements, pages, features or new functionality of the Website to see how our users react to them.

choices.title: 3. Your Choices Regarding Cookies
choices.content1: If You prefer to avoid the use of Cookies on the Website, first You must disable the use of Cookies in your browser and then delete the Cookies saved in your browser associated with this website. You may use this option for preventing the use of Cookies at any time.
choices.content2: If You do not accept Our Cookies, You may experience some inconvenience in your use of the Website and some features may not function properly.
choices.content3: For more information on how to manage and delete Cookies, visit the official support documents for your specific web browser (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge, etc.).

moreInfo.title: 4. More Information about Cookies
moreInfo.content: You can learn more about cookies: What Are Cookies?.

contact.title: 5. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Cookie Policy, You can contact us:

intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: FairArena respects the intellectual property rights of others and expects our users to do the same. In accordance with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 (DMCA), we will respond expeditiously to claims of copyright infringement committed using our service.

notification.title: Filing a DMCA Notice
notification.text: If you believe that content on FairArena infringes your copyright, please provide our Copyright Agent with the following information:
list: A physical or electronic signature of the copyright owner or person authorized to act on their behalf
Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed
Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing, with sufficient detail to locate it on our service
Your contact information (address, telephone number, and email address)
A statement that you have a good faith belief that use of the material is not authorized by the copyright owner
A statement that the information in the notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that you are authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner

counter.title: Counter-Notification
counter.text: If you believe that your content was removed by mistake or misidentification, you may file a counter-notification with our Copyright Agent. The counter-notification must include:
list: Your physical or electronic signature
Identification of the material that has been removed and its location before removal
A statement under penalty of perjury that you have a good faith belief the material was removed by mistake
Your name, address, and telephone number
A statement that you consent to the jurisdiction of the federal court in your district

repeat.title: Repeat Infringers
repeat.text: FairArena will terminate the accounts of users who are determined to be repeat infringers. We reserve the right to decide whether content violates our policies for reasons other than copyright infringement.

contact.title: Copyright Agent Contact
contact.text: All DMCA notices and counter-notifications should be sent to our designated Copyright Agent:
contact.liability: Please note that under Section 512(f) of the DMCA, any person who knowingly materially misrepresents that material or activity is infringing may be subject to liability.
